data.title: Glenn Ong, Vernetta Lopez and FD
data.meta_description: It was too hilarious. Glenn Ong, Vernetta Lopez and FD s morning conversation just now.   Glenn was saying that if he ever gonna get married for the 3 rd time, hell sing that song.   Plain White Ts 1234   You make it easy, it's as easy as 1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4…
data.text:
It was too hilarious.

Glenn Ong, Vernetta Lopez and FD’s morning conversation just now.

Glenn was saying that if he ever gonna get married

for the 3rd time, he’ll sing that song.

Plain White T’s 1234

“You make it easy, it's as easy as 1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4

There's only one thing

to do

Three words

for you

I love you

There's only one way

to say

Those three words and that's what I'll do, I love you”

He so confident somemore

saying that he’s gonna sing it better..hehe.

And the conversation got so humourous.

I remembered when Vern said Glenn is like the

Elizabeth Taylor of Singapore.

That was soooo funny..

I mean Elizabeth Taylor married

many many times right.

You don’t geddit?

Ok nvm.

Bi and me were laughing

and repeating their humour..

Oh man…did anyone catch their conversation too??!

and

Can I just share how much I love Vernetta Lopez?

She is one cool cool babe!

iLURVE her humour!!!

Of course,

My fav is still Glenn Ong.

And yeah,

I still remembered that incident..

AHHHHH…

Ok let me share with you my very quick quick brush with glenn.

AIYOYO!

I so excited lah to share this!

Ok ok..let me recall..

OMG.

Many years back,

I won something (which is the only time I won anything)

after being the 3rd or the 9th caller…

Something like that..I cant remember..

But it was during Daniel Ong’s show.

If im not wrong

I won some tokens for UK funfair..

And had to collect at Mediacorp..

That time still called TCS..

Not SBC lah..that one too long ago seyy..

Im just supposed to change my pass and go to their office.

Which is at level 3 (I think so).

But I ended up at level 5.

But that level 5 is the level where they do their recording sessions!

I think that time one of the DJs working was Carrie Chong.

I was like..OMG.

I need to go to their office.

Wrong level!

Then I took the lift again..

And inside was..

YES! GLENN ONG!!!!!!

I was like OMG OMG OMG..

Too stunned.

But I kept my cool..

Then he introduced himself.

“Im Glenn.”

In my heart I was like..

D’UH!!!!!!!

Of course la I know you are Glenn Ong!

The GLENN ONG!

Goodness me you are my idol!

Then I told him im supposed to find their office.

So he pressed level 3 and when we reached their office,

ROD MONTEIRO was there too!

And GLENN introduced me to ROD too..

WOW WOW!

Them 2 are like the bestest bestest pair ever..

“brudder brudder..”

Haha..who could forget that!

And so I collected my prize

from one of the girls in the office..

And I said my goodbyes to them..

And that was it..

You know sometimes I get people telling me

I looked like Jamie Yeo

(ni betol eh..bukan bedek bedek).

She is the ex wife to Glenn Ong.

When they got married last time,

I told people

“Seee…see…that’s me with Glenn Ong..”

Hehe..

Its just some lame joke lah ok.

But sadly

they did not last..it was a shocker.

And now Glenn is with Jean Danker.

The media are very interested in their

personal life..

but hey, leave them alone lah ah..

i respect them for their profession.

I wish them all the best for their future.

I love our DJs..

They are a funny bunch.

Im a happy bunny today.

heehee.

And later, we’ll be having Botak Jones for lunch!

YABEDABEDOOOOOOO!!
